Question
========

We drew a random sample from a population, with the following 5 sample outcomes: 6, 9, 6, 11, 13. The 95% confidence interval for the population mean is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* < 5.17 ; 12.83 >
* < 5.46 ; 12.54 >
* < 6.06 ; 11.94 >>
* < 6.30 ; 11.70 >

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* < 5.17 ; 12.83 >: Correct
* < 5.46 ; 12.54 >: Incorrect
* < 6.06 ; 11.94 >>: Incorrect
* < 6.30 ; 11.70 >: Incorrect
